---
title: "Kien Nguyen"
about:
  template: trestles
  image: profile.png
---

Kien is a senior at Macalester College. He majored in English (Creative Writing), Computer Science and Linguistics. He is the editor-in-chief at *Chanter Literary and Arts Magazine*. He was born in Hanoi, Vietnam and currently resides in St. Paul, Minnesota.
